text: The New Democratic Party of Quebec fielded fifty-five candidates in the 1989 Quebec provincial election,General elections - 1989, September 25 - Official results for all electoral divisions, Le Directeur général des élections du Québec. Accessed 30 November 2012. none of whom were elected. ==Candidates== (n.c.: no candidate) {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:left; font-size:95%" |- ! Riding ! Candidate's name !
